edu.uw.cs.cse461.net.rpc

Interface RPCServiceInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RPCService

    public interface RPCServiceInterface
    The interface for the side of RPC that receives incoming calls.
    Author:
    zahorjan

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RPCCallableMethod getRegistrationFor(String serviceName, String methodName)
      Some of the testing code needs to retrieve the current registration for a particular service and method, so this interface is required.
      int localPort()
      Returns the port number of the RPC server socket on this node.
      void registerHandler(String serviceName, String methodName, RPCCallableMethod method)
      Sets up a callback when an incoming RPC mentions the service and method given by the arguments.

    • Method Detail

      • registerHandler

        void registerHandler(String serviceName,
                   String methodName,
                   RPCCallableMethod method)
                     throws Exception
        Sets up a callback when an incoming RPC mentions the service and method given by the arguments.
        Parameters:
        serviceName - The name the service or appliation is known by for RPC.
        methodName - The name for the method, as used in RPC invocations.
        method - The descriptor for the Java method to connect to the serviceName/methodName
        Throws:
        Exception

      • getRegistrationFor

        RPCCallableMethod getRegistrationFor(String serviceName,
                                   String methodName)
        Some of the testing code needs to retrieve the current registration for a particular service and method, so this interface is required. You probably won't find a use for it in your code, though.
        Parameters:
        serviceName - The service name
        methodName - The method name
        Returns:
        The existing registration for that method of that service, or null if no registration exists.

      • localPort

        int localPort()
        Returns the port number of the RPC server socket on this node. (The IP is available from IPFinder.localIP().)
